official_title: To reduce temporarily the column 2 rate of duty on certain machine tools for planing, gear cutting, gear grinding, or gear finishing.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce the column 2 rate of duty, through December 31, 1992, on certain machine tools for planing, gear cutting, gear grinding, or gear finishing.

titles.title: To reduce temporarily the column 2 rate of duty on certain machine tools for planing, gear cutting, gear grinding, or gear finishing.
